MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the ML11 postcode area of Motherwell, affecting properties in Arran Road and surrounding streets. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut, and became aware of this at 9:59AM. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of an underground cable fault  located between Bute substation and Arran substation and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 5PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:58AM on 14 February 2021.
